snippet.title: [PS2] Radirgy Precious - Gameplay
snippet.description:
I need to practice...

PS2 SCPH-77004
AverMedia C039 Capture Card

Running the game through SMBv1 share using OPL 1.2.0 Beta.
The game is compressed to ZSO.
The console is connected to the capture card through composite, I am open to PS2 S-Video cable recommendations.

Used Media Player Classic to display and OBS to crop and record the screen, I know this is inefficient but MPC freezes when I start recording on it. I have found no alternative program for recording in any OS for this specific capture card. Also I forgot to do deinterlacing, lol.
